data.text: @ValentiaDM @amscanlon The Halpin family are so inbred even the family's pet dog has a club foot.
@ValentiaDM Self absorbed doses the pair of them

@ValentiaDM They really are a law unto themselves. I don’t know of any other organisation that gets away with being so inept, unqualified, and irresponsible year after year. Still in receipt of state funding, and treated as an authority on all sorts.
@lilly_flynn I don’t know how they could have any credibility with healthcare staff with a history of those sort of antics.
@ValentiaDM Sweet suffering fuck! You couldn’t make this shit up.
@ValentiaDM @cuntasoir The sheer entitlement. It makes you sick.
@ValentiaDM I'm sure a few dedicated, ethical pharmacy staff got abused by Teni cult followers based on shoddy advice.

@cuntasoir @ziltam Lots of us get seromas after mastectomy, we are told to watch and wait.Apparently that doesn’t apply to trans surgeries(though it’s a very similar surgery except slightly less tissue removed) and those who have them should be able to demand treatment others don’t get, COVID or no
@ValentiaDM It was irresponsible beyond belief. Pharmacists were under a lot of pressure for the last two years as more people were reluctant to contact GPs.

@ValentiaDM https://t.co/7tfATBNwRK

Despite being told 9 months previously by a professional that's not the case
